questions.question: The object that can slide is
The object that can roll is
Match the following
questions.svg_content:
<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='130'>
  <circle cx='30' cy='40' r='20' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='lightblue'/>
  <text x='30' y='100' text-anchor='middle' font-size='14'>a</text>

  <polygon points='70,60 60,30 80,30' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <text x='70' y='100' text-anchor='middle' font-size='14'>b</text>

  <rect x='100' y='30' width='30' height='30' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='lightcoral'/>
  <text x='115' y='100' text-anchor='middle' font-size='14'>c</text>

  <rect x='145' y='30' width='40' height='30' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='lightgoldenrodyellow'/>
  <text x='165' y='100' text-anchor='middle' font-size='14'>d</text>

  <path d='M225,40 C220,20 200,20 200,40 C200,55 215,65 225,75 C235,65 250,55 250,40 C250,20 230,20 225,40 Z' fill='lightpink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <text x='225' y='100' text-anchor='middle' font-size='14'>e</text>
</svg>

questions.question: Fill in the blanks :
questions.svg_content:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="400" height="150">

  <!-- Circle -->
  <circle cx="40" cy="40" r="20" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="lightblue"/>
  <text x="40" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14">a</text>

  <!-- Triangle -->
  <polygon points="100,60 90,30 110,30" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="lightgreen"/>
  <text x="100" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14">b</text>

  <!-- Square -->
  <rect x="140" y="30" width="30" height="30" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="lightcoral"/>
  <text x="155" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14">c</text>

  <!-- Rectangle -->
  <rect x="200" y="30" width="50" height="30" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="lightgoldenrodyellow"/>
  <text x="225" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14">d</text>

</svg>
questions.title: Complete the Multiplication Table

feedback.full_credit: Perfect! All blanks are correctly filled.
feedback.partial_credit: Some answers are correct. Review the table.
feedback.none: No correct entries. Please try again.
